properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
F/V BARAKA DISABLED AND ADRIFT DUE TO ENGINE
FAILURE IN 08-15.4N 017-51.5W AT 241330Z OCT.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO
MRCC DAKAR, PHONE: 2213 3826 5001,
FAX: 2213 3826 5000, E-MAIL: MARINENAT@ORANGE.SN.
